youtube.title: What is Fissured Tongue? (Lingua Plicata) Explained üëÖ
youtube.description: Learn about Fissured Tongue, also known as Lingua Plicata. This common condition features deep grooves on the tongue's surface. Discover why it happens and how to maintain oral health with this quick medical biology guide. Perfect for students and curious minds!
